props.Name: Feral Instincts
props.Description: Each successful attack increases unit's focus by {1}.

props.Name: Tainted Blood
props.Description: Adds {1} Poison counters to the attacker when struck in melee.

props.Name: Fearsome
props.Description: Reduces target's Morale by {1} on each successful attack and by half the amount for all units that have you In Sight at the time.

props.Name: Rage
props.Description: Gain {1} Rage counters for every hit taken, each increases Damage, Initiative and Spellpower by 5%, but reduces Defense by 5%. 20 Rage counters make unit go Berserk. A counter is lost each turn.

props.Name: Soul Reaper
props.Description: Gain {1} Soul counters for every unit slain, but no more than unit's Level.

props.Name: Fire Shield
props.Description: Deals {1} Fire damage to all attackers.

props.Name: Electrified
props.Description: Deals {1} Lightning damage to all attackers.

props.Name: Frost Shield
props.Description: Deals {1} Water damage to all attackers.
